content: Hi @Bryn Rhodes. I'd like to participate in the CQL 1.5 ballot reconciliation. Could you post the details regarding any meetings where ballot reconciliation will occur?
Hi Chris, the CDS WG Virtual WGM schedule is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CDS/2020-05+-+Virtual+WGM+Agenda
Specifically, Thursday, 12:00-2:00 ET we will be doing CQL Ballot Reconciliation, using the following Zoom:

Join Zoom Meeting
https://zoom.us/j/2097018272?pwd=WC9tVWY2NnRTSmVHN21ja3gxeERqZz09

Meeting ID: 209 701 8272
Password: 343027

One tap mobile
+16465588656,,2097018272# US (New York)
+16699009128,,2097018272# US (San Jose)
If that changes, or we plan additional reconciliation, I will post the details here
In addition to continued ballot reconciliation on next Wednesday's CDS call, we will be considering two block votes:

CQL 2020 May Block Vote 1: project = FHIR AND Specification = "Clinical Quality Language (FHIR) [FHIR-cql]" AND status = triaged and grouping = block-vote-1 ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC
CQL 2020 May Block Vote 2: project = FHIR AND Specification = "Clinical Quality Language (FHIR) [FHIR-cql]" AND status = triaged and grouping = block-vote-2 ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC

The first block vote has non-controversial minor persuasive items.
The second block vote has presumed non-controversial persuasive items.
